episodes.title: The Canadian Cult That Was Massacred by Its Own Leader During 1989
episodes.description:
The Canadian Cult That Was Massacred by Its Own Leader During 1989

From devout Catholic to merciless cult master, the Ant Hill Kids built an empire on control, cruelty, and blood. Claiming visions from the divine, 
Roch Thériault, their leader, promised salvation but delivered suffering. 

In the largest mass self-harm in U.S. history, these cults promised salvation but delivered death. From apocalyptic prophecies to alien mandates, these are 15 of the most horrifying cults ever—number 6 is so disturbing, you’ll wish you could forget it.
